title: Never got the rp I bought and got barged for
body: Bought $35 worth of rp got charged for it never actually got the points. Support takes forever.

replies.body:
I've got your purchase history pulled up, and I'm not seeing any recent transactions so there's a good chance that this attempt didn't actually go through and what you're seeing is a pending charge that should fall off eventually (typically around 3-5 business days). 

If it definitely looks like you were charged and the system never gave you the points, go ahead and hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) where we can get that fixed up for you!
